title: Historia ænigmatica, de gemellis Genoæ connatis, anno salutis nostræ, MDCXX in unum coalescentibus, quorum major Lazaz, minor Joh. Baptista, ad sacrum fontem nominatis : vivis hodie, & mercede Londini monstratis An. MDCXXXVII.
notes: Printed beneath portrait: Printed for Robert Milbourne at the Vnicorne neare Fleet Bridge.
